OrgName.entry: NORFOLK PARK CONNEXIONS CENTRE - YOUTH CLUB

Desc.entry: Youth club for young people aged 13-19 years, run by Sheffield Futures (see separate entry). Provides the opportunity to get involved in lots of different activities and groups, as well as a place to relax and socialise. A registered charity.

DisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in Community hall, level floor access throughout, Braille signage, car parking, free hire of mobility scooter - book in advance on Tel 286 0400

ContactName.entry: Sean Greaves, Sheffield Futures Youth Worker
